events.title: CrowdStrike Global IT Outage
events.description: On 19th July 2024, CrowdStrike, a prominent cybersecurity technology company, experienced a significant global IT outage. The incident severely impacted its services and customers worldwide, highlighting the vulnerabilities in even the most robust security infrastructures.

events.title: MacRumors - Apple Announces iPhone 16
events.description: Apple announced the iPhone 16, featuring significant advancements in battery life and camera technology.

events.title: Google Quantum Supremacy
events.description: Google achieved a breakthrough in quantum computing, claiming quantum supremacy with a new quantum processor.

events.title: Meta Unveils New VR Headset
events.description: Meta Platforms unveiled its latest VR headset, providing enhanced virtual reality experiences and features.
